trans-unit.source: Represents the abstract base class from which several classes in the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description"></xref> namespace are derived.

Several classes are derived from this class: - <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Binding> - <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Import> - <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Message> - <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.MessagePart> - <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Operation> - <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding> - <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationMessage> - <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Port> - <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.PortType> - <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Service> - <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Types> This base class contains only one property, the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.DocumentableItem.Documentation%2A> property, which represents the text documentation for a specific WSDL (Web Services Description Language) element.
For more information about WSDL, see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.
Initializes an instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.DocumentableItem"></xref> class.
Gets or sets the text documentation for the instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.DocumentableItem"></xref>.
In a derived class, this property represents the text comments added to an element of the XML Web service.
The default implementation is an empty string ("").
A string that represents the documentation for the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.DocumentableItem"></xref>.
Gets or sets the documentation element for the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.DocumentableItem"></xref>.
This property contains XML elements that are added to a description of an XML Web service to document it.
A <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref> that represents the documentation for the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.DocumentableItem"></xref>.
Gets or sets an array of type <xref href="System.Xml.XmlAttribute"></xref> that represents attribute extensions of WSDL to comply with Web Services Interoperability (WS-I) Basic Profile 1.1.
An array of type <xref href="System.Xml.XmlAttribute"></xref> that represents attribute extensions of WSDL to comply with Web Services Interoperability (WS-I) Basic Profile 1.1.

Gets or sets the dictionary of namespace prefixes and namespaces used to preserve namespace prefixes and namespaces when a <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> object is constructed.
